reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, well-made, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy and really soft.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater!
items.body: Edited: I ordered two more in a medium, but had to return them because they were sized like a small. They are cute and a good weight, but I reordered in a large size because it is better to have them a little big so I can wear a shirt under them or at least button them. I would go up a size. Original: This is a well-made and beautiful sweater. Order your normal size. (Would go up a size now that I ordered the medium) I am a medium (not in these I am not), (sometimes a large), ordered a large, and I am swimming in it. It is not cropped, and the sleeves go to the wrists. Love this sweater! Ordered two more for the winter. Read more
items.author: Rufus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big sweater
items.body: I ordered the snow man and santa Christmas version. I love it BUT it is not as pictured -- which is why I am sure it is frequently returned. This a large coat-sweater. It is something you would wear over something else. It's very thick and would be too hot and bulky as a top. But, I do like it -- I will wear it as a second layer on chilly days. It's very cute. Read more
items.author: L. Jayne

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute & soft
items.body: I ordered this sweater 1 month ago. It finally arrived, but unfortunately damaged near the eye. It is a beautiful sweater, runs small, but soo cute. Read more
items.author: Donna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, soft, and cheerful — a lovely cardigan with one small flaw
items.body: This cardigan was a pleasant surprise. Although it’s listed as a Funny Patterned Seasonal Holiday Sweater, the Plant-Purple design I ordered is actually a beautiful, understated floral pattern. The lilac-purple background, soft green stems, and lighter lavender buds create a calm, uplifting color palette — perfect for someone who loves purple and green tones. The sweater is a generous length, coming to the top of my hips at 5'5". The ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem give it a classic, finished look. It’s made of 100% polyester, but feels soft and cozy, not scratchy, and it works equally well for dressy or casual wear. I washed it on a delicate cycle and dried it flat; it held its shape perfectly and showed no pilling. The faux-wood buttons look natural and suit the floral design nicely, though it doesn’t include an extra button. My only small critique is that the buttonholes aren’t very firmly finished. They work fine, but if you plan to button and unbutton the sweater often, you might wish they were reinforced a bit more. Overall, the quality is good for the price, the fit is true to size, and the pattern is both cheerful and soothing. I rated it four stars for the buttonhole issue, but otherwise it’s a soft, flattering cardigan that feels durable and is sure to become a favorite piece in my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Rev Marcy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality. Tiny little pearls as snowflakes.
items.body: I love the sweater. It's actually better than the picture online shows. I had no idea that each of the snowflakes on the Christmas trees were actually tiny little pearls. It's soft, thick and beautiful. I could not be any happier. excellent quality. Read more
items.author: SherryLee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great sweater
items.body: His sweater is a great quality sweater. I was very surprised and it is really super cute. Feels soft and not itchy. Very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Beckie

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not True to Size - Santa Would Be Upset!!
items.body: Not true to size except for the super long sleeves. I had to roll them up otherwise the sleeves covered my hands. It is super thick which does not come across in the photo. In the photo it looks looser and softer. I wear either Xl or XXL for dresses, shirts etc so I thought that this would fit the same way. I cannot even button it. Such a strange fit. Not happy at all. Read more
items.author: fzxtchr

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small
items.body: Really thick and warm, pretty print and good quality for the price. Only complaint is that it is snug. I tried it on and it was a little small already and then shrunk even more in the wash. I washed on cold and hung dry but it still shrunk some. I would recommend sizing up one size. Read more
items.author: Brittany

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dog-white, Valentine-beige, Cat-white, St-green, Black, Christmas-winter, Zz-orange, Halloween-green, Elk-white, P-white, Halloween-orange-1, Christmas Light-white, Heart-c, Zz-green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
